bike.description: Alpha Platinum Aluminum main frame & stays w/ABP Convert, magnesium swing link, G2 Geometry, DRCV shock mount, E2 tapered head tube, replaceable derailleur hanger, 120mm travel

components.description: Formula DH92 20mm 32-hole front hub, Shimano M529 32-hole alloy rear hub; Bontrager Duster Disc 29 rims, Tubeless Ready
Bontrager Low Riser, 31.8mm, 15mm rise, 9 degree sweep
FSA NO.57E, E2, ACB sealed bearings
Trek fork & shock sag meter, Bontrager shock pump
